txt.en:
'Golden Festival Tokens are used to purchase the rarest of goods!'

<rgb=#FF0000>This festival has a set of three tiered deeds that advance upon completing festival content. Completion of these deeds unlocks access to purchase rewards from a special barter vendor, and grants you Golden Festival Tokens.

These tokens are sometimes required, along with regular festival tokens, to purchase rewards to which you have unlocked access. The barter vendor that sells these goods is present in the hub area of the current festival.</rgb>
